Closing.definition: the fulfillment or performance of a contract esp. for the sale of real estate ;also

1.1: the fulfillment or performance of a contract esp. for the sale of real estate

2.1: a meeting at which the closing of a contract takes place [represented us at the ]
2.note: At the closing for the completion of the sale of real property, the purchase price is paid and title is transferred to the purchaser or mortgagor.
